Waterlooville's Best Hair Salons: Where the Locals Actually Go

From budget-friendly cuts to luxury treatments

By Lucy Henderson•9 October 2025•5 min read

Waterlooville has a thriving hair and beauty scene with over 1,300 reviews across our top 5 salons. We've analyzed the data to find out which salons are delivering the best results—and which ones have earned their customers' loyalty.

The Top Performers

Based on real customer reviews, here are Waterlooville's standout salons:

  • •Studio H - Perfect 5.0 stars (534 reviews) - The gold standard
  • •Summers and Co Hair Boutique - Perfect 5.0 stars (207 reviews) - Luxury meets quality
  • •Hair Addiction Salons - 4.9 stars (192 reviews) - Consistently excellent
  • •Hair Ott Waterlooville - 4.8 stars (341 reviews) - Great value and quality
  • •The Cowplain Barber Shop - 4.7 stars (121 reviews) - Best for men's cuts

What Makes Them Special

The top-rated salons in Waterlooville share key strengths: consistency in results, professional consultation, value for money, and a relaxing atmosphere. Studio H and Summers and Co have achieved perfect 5-star ratings by consistently delivering on all fronts.

The Verdict

If you're looking for the absolute best, Studio H is your answer—534 reviews and a perfect 5-star rating speaks volumes. For luxury treatments, Summers and Co Hair Boutique at The Farmhouse Sanctuary offers a unique experience. And for men, The Cowplain Barber Shop delivers quality cuts at great prices.

✂️ **Pro Tip:** Studio H has over 500 reviews and maintains a perfect 5-star rating. Book well in advance—they're popular for a reason.
